socializer.core.Person

    Package Description
    socializer.core
    Contains application core types.

      Methods in socializer.core with parameters of type Person 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PersonManager.addFriend(Person friend)
      sends invitation for the friendship to another person; accepts the counter invitation if one exists.
      Post[] AdminManager.getBlockedPosts(Person publisher, java.util.Date oldest, java.util.Date newest)
      Retrieves all the blocked posts of the specified person, issued between "oldest" and "newest" time points
      java.lang.String AdminManager.getBlockingReason(Person p)
      Retrieves a blocking reason of the person account (null if not blocked)
      Message[] PersonManager.getConversation(Person interlocutor, java.util.Date oldest, java.util.Date newest)
      Retrieves person's conversation with a friend/support team.
      Friendship PersonManager.getFriendship(Person p)
      Retrieves friendship entity between the logged in person and the person given
      Post[] PersonManager.getPosts(Person publisher, java.util.Date oldest, java.util.Date newest)
      Retrieves posts of the given person
      void AdminManager.lockAccount(Person account, java.lang.String blockingReason)
      Locks person's account (attaching also a reason for that).
      void PersonManager.removeFriend(Person friend)
      Removes the person from the friend list / cancels friendship invitation.
      void AdminManager.unlockAccount(Person account)
      Unlocks the specified account.
